<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; ShiftValue; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the previous alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a0a648e1baa573dcc8a550235ed44e7ae"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#ae18e74b77ef6d55c8c3bd8c1a00cc2f4">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a0a648e1baa573dcc8a550235ed44e7ae">previous</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ShiftValue != 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Undefined operation&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#ae18e74b77ef6d55c8c3bd8c1a00cc2f4">Align</a> Out;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out.ShiftValue = ShiftValue - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Out;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> == 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a434f6a0d80fb13e4326e848a6391f057">llvm::isPowerOf2&#95;64</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Alignment is neither 0 nor a power of 2&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For convenience, returns a valid alignment or 1 if undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign/#a06846474be3ab85f8d30c388faf3b116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign/#a06846474be3ab85f8d30c388faf3b116">valueOrOne</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value&#95;or(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>()); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks that SizeInBytes is a multiple of the alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Lhs, uint64&#95;t SizeInBytes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SizeInBytes % Lhs.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>() == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks that Addr is a multiple of the alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9992f46ab43b45770fddfdefef7c237"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9992f46ab43b45770fddfdefef7c237">isAddrAligned</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Addr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(Lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uintptr&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Addr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns a multiple of A needed to store &#96;Size&#96; bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.value();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following line is equivalent to &#96;(Size + Value - 1) / Value &#42; Value&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The division followed by a multiplication can be thought of as a right</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift followed by a left shift which zeros out the extra bits produced in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the bump; &#96;~(Value - 1)&#96; is a mask where all those bits being zeroed out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are just zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Most compilers can generate this code but the pattern may be missed when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple functions gets inlined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - 1) &amp; ~(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> - 1U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If non-zero \\p Skew is specified, the return value will be a minimal integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that is greater than or equal to \\p Size and equal to \\p A &#42; N + \\p Skew for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// some integer N. If \\p Skew is larger than \\p A, its value is adjusted to &#39;\\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Skew mod \\p A&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Examples:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   alignTo(5, Align(8), 7) = 7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   alignTo(17, Align(8), 1) = 17</span></CodeLine>
